entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Pilot Mound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:32 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -31.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pilot Mound 07:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023
Temperature: -31.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.1 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -34.4°C
Wind: WSW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 30 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 27. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind south 20 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
